basics.name: Dr. Emily Watson
basics.label: Senior Data Scientist
basics.summary: PhD-qualified data scientist with 8+ years of experience applying machine learning and statistical analysis to solve complex business problems. Expertise in predictive modeling, NLP, and data visualization. Published researcher with strong communication skills.

work.name: DataTech Solutions
work.summary: Leading data science initiatives for predictive analytics and ML solutions.
highlights: Developed customer churn prediction model with 92% accuracy, saving $2M annually
Built recommendation system increasing product cross-sell by 35%
Led team of 4 data scientists and mentored junior team members
Deployed ML models to production using Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS SageMaker
Presented findings to C-suite executives and translated technical concepts to business impact

work.name: FinanceCorp
work.summary: Applied ML and statistical methods to financial data analysis.
highlights: Created fraud detection system reducing false positives by 40%
Performed time-series forecasting for revenue prediction with 85% accuracy
Built automated data pipeline processing 10M+ transactions daily
Conducted A/B testing to optimize user engagement strategies

work.name: Research Institute
work.summary: Analyzed large datasets and conducted statistical research.
highlights: Performed statistical analysis on healthcare datasets using R and Python
Created interactive dashboards using Tableau for stakeholder reporting

publications.name: Novel Approaches to Interpretable Machine Learning in Healthcare
publications.summary: Proposing new methods for creating interpretable ML models in medical diagnosis applications.

publications.name: Scalable Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing
publications.summary: Presenting efficient training techniques for large-scale transformer models.

publications.name: Adversarial Robustness in Computer Vision Systems
publications.summary: Investigating vulnerabilities in CV models and proposing defense mechanisms.

publications.name: Bayesian Methods for A/B Testing at Scale
publications.summary: Developing practical Bayesian approaches for large-scale experimentation platforms.
